adept.kbapi.sql

Class QuickJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.kbapi.sql.QuickJDBC

  • public class QuickJDBC
extends Object
    Utility class that interacts with the SQL metadata database. Provides wrappers for connecting to database, executing queries and updates, committing, rolling back and closing connections.

    • Constructor Summary
